name: Kinesis.io
body:
### The Framework The framework gives access to: * Gesture Recognition like hand swipe, multiple joint tracking and various body movements. * Speech Recognition to aid actionable keywords. * 3D depth data to facilitate augmented reality apps Kinesis leverages technologies web developers already know best HTML/CSS/JavaScript. So you can reuse your existing code and existing team to build gesture enabled applications. ### How to get started? Similar to other JS libraries, just add the JS file to the HTML source. ``` ``` * On Windows Along side that, install the Kinect for Windows SDK available from [http://kinectforwindows.com](http://kinectforwindows.com) * On Mac OS X You can run the Microsoft Kinect and the Kinesis Native component using VMWare or Parallels. ### Simulators For development purposes, a Kinect Simulator is available on the following platforms. * Windows * Mac OS X ### Docs [http://kinesis-docs.heroku.com](http://kinesis-docs.heroku.com) ### Authors and Contributors (Alphabetically) Achal Aggarwal (@achalaggarwal)
Bhavesh Dhupar (@bhavesh)
Payal Gupta (@payalgupta)
